system.sustained: Target Individual opposes Focus Power Test with Willpower. If Psyker wins, target cannot attack psyker and suffers -10 Penalty to all Tests as a result of being distracted by the Psyker's Overwhelming greatness. The Target attacks anyone who obviously attempts to harm the Psyker, ignoring the -10 Penalty from this power when doing so. Otherwise, the target may act freely as long as the Psyker is not in danger.
